title: Further in case of reconstruction/redevelopment of the buildings of Corporation existing prior to 30
clause_text: Further in case of reconstruction/redevelopment of the buildings of Corporation existing prior to 30.09.1969 as per this Regulation, the BUA beyond area required for re-accommodation of existing occupants and incentive thereon of such rehab area if any shall have to be shared between MCGM and Society of occupants in the ratio of 1(MCGM): 0.5(Society of occupants) or compensation for MCGM share shall be paid to MCGM, as per policy of Municipal corporation.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
